lead_paragraph: With virtually nothing but repeats on network television in prime time on the final Wednesday of 2009, CBS’s “Criminal Minds” and “CSI: NY” easily dominated the night.
snippet: With virtually nothing but repeats on network television in prime time on the final Wednesday of 2009, CBS’s “Criminal Minds” and “CSI: NY” easily dominated the night.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN  TOFF; Compiled by JULIE BLOOM
